user_question: How many human quotes are provided with source in this document?

knowledge_chain.query: human quotes with source cited in document
knowledge_chain.raw_result:
The provided context includes one direct human quote with an attributed source:

> "Germany is in a very competitive position today, more than ever" — attributed to Stephane Garelli, Director of the World Competitiveness Center at IMD.

This quote appears in the visual analysis of the infographic titled "Germany: The China of Europe" (Image Path: /.../2f6ffbf642de9b779bb1bdf817f2a363f53d287ca1cbddf31d4f5cea81a8c510.jpg), where it is presented in italicized gray text at the bottom margin of the infographic. The quote supports the narrative of Germany’s strong economic and entrepreneurial position relative to other G7 nations.

### References

- [1] earlybird-110722143746-phpapp02_95.pdf
knowledge_chain.summary: The document includes one human quote with an attributed source: 'Germany is in a very competitive position today, more than ever' by Stephane Garelli, Director of the World Competitiveness Center at IMD. This quote is presented in the infographic titled 'Germany: The China of Europe' to support the narrative of Germany's economic strength.
